alert.note: Alert for Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:04PM PST until January 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches in the upper Sacramento River Canyon, with up to 8 inches over the higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County County including Interstate 5 near Dunsmuir. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery and snow covered road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will be around 2,500 feet. Little to no snow accumulation is expected below 1,500 feet. A few lingering snow showers are possible this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for California can be obtained by calling 800-427-7623 (ROAD) or visit quickmap.dot.ca.gov for the latest road conditions before traveling.

area.areaDesc: Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
